about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Savior's Hand is a "simple driving/action game where you find and destroy enemies."

A new control method that you have never seen before will delight your hands.

You don't need to spend a lot of money to buy expensive gaming equipment.

You don't need a large space to put the gaming equipment.

"Everything is ready."

Now save the underground world occupied by robots with your own hands.

Challenge the new record.

Feature

- H-Shifter is in the game.

- Gear change using clutch pedal. Acceleration and stopping using brake and accelerator pedal.

- Clutch is very important.

- "Training Zone" is not available in the demo version.

- In the demo version, pressing start game will immediately enter the "Challenge Zone".

- In the demo version, you can kill only up to 10 enemies.

- In the demo version, there is no lobby where you can check the game record.

- In the demo version, the gear control section is overwritten with a simple operation method.

"Challenge Zone"

- The map and enemy locations change every time you start a new game.

- You can save and exit the game at any time, and continue playing later.

- There are gas stations, repair shops, weapon shops, and item shops.

- In the "Challenge Zone", the time it takes to kill 50 enemies is recorded and ranked. Try to shorten the record.

- You can use differentiated strategies by using special weapons.

"Training Zone"

- You can practice while watching the friendly explanation.

- In the "Training Zone", items, armor, and fuel are provided infinitely.

- In the "Training Zone", time is not recorded, so you can practice comfortably. Practice until you are fully acclimated.

Game Tip

To use the store elevator, unlock all weapons and special abilities and turn off the engine.
